CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES( Client_Overview__r.Clinical_Data_Sharing_and_Access__c , "None"), "None; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Client_Overview__r.Clinical_Data_Sharing_and_Access__c , "Clinical Portal - Care Coordination"), "Clinical Portal - Care Coordination; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Client_Overview__r.Clinical_Data_Sharing_and_Access__c , "Clinical Portal - Shared Coaching"), "Clinical Portal - Shared Coaching; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Client_Overview__r.Clinical_Data_Sharing_and_Access__c , "Reporting/File Share"), "Reporting/File Share; ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Client_Overview__r.Clinical_Data_Sharing_and_Access__c , "API Integration"), "API Integration; ", NULL)
CustomField.label: Clinical Data Sharing and Access
